bibl.title: The Prefect's Conventus: Proceedings and Procedures.
bibl.note: The copious and variated business that deluged the conventus was channeled according to a simple principle: Whatever could not be processed without the prefect's personal attention and ruling would be set aside for his consideration; everything else would be delegated to an appropriate agency.
bibl.seg: Lewis Naphtali, The Prefect's Conventus: Proceedings and Procedures.
